thread.title: New Friday the 13th trailer shows off Jason's morph ability
thread.title_full: New Friday the 13th trailer shows off Jason's morph ability

title: New Friday the 13th trailer shows off Jason's morph ability
text:
Don't run, just materialise. Shares 
The new Friday the 13th game is coming out in Spring (or Autumn in Australia), so Gun Media is starting to dole out trailers at a steadier clip. This latest one features Jason, ie the bad guy who wears the mask, as he attempts to murder innocent people in cold blood. You see, in this asymmetrical multiplayer game, Jason will search and destroy up to seven other human players. 
It's a good concept, and this latest trailer is the best demonstration of it so far. Jason can only walk by all appearances, so it's lucky he has a Morph ability, which allows him to ominously appear in the vicinity of his quarry without having to sprint like a lowly non-psychopathic human being. 
Check out the trailer below. As I mentioned, the multiplayer component of Friday the 13th is coming out in Spring, but the singleplayer won't arrive until later in the year. ABOUT THE AUTHOR Shaun Prescott Shaun is PC Gamerâ€™s Australian Editor. He loves masochistic platformers but lacks the skill and grace to complete them. He has four broken keyboards hidden under his desk, filed between an emergency six-pack of Reschs and five years worth of XXL promotional t-shirts. He stares out the window a lot. Topics
